perks.name: Slightly More Popular Commander
perks.extended_description: The pool of commanders you are offered will be of lower average EDHRec rank, so more popular.

perks.name: More Popular Commander
perks.extended_description: The pool of commanders you are offered will be of lower average EDHRec rank, so more popular.

perks.name: Considerably More Popular Commander
perks.extended_description: The pool of commanders you are offered will be of lower average EDHRec rank, so more popular.

perks.name: Salty Commander
perks.extended_description: All of your commander options will feature commanders with a high salt rating from EDHRec. This typically correlates with power.
perks.description: All commander options from the salty pool

perks.name: Restrict 1 Color
perks.extended_description: Choose one color, your commander options WILL NOT include commanders that have that color in their color identity.
perks.description: Exclude one color from commander pool

perks.name: Include 1 Color
perks.extended_description: Choose one color, your commander options WILL include commanders that have that color in their color identity.
perks.description: Pick 1 color to include in commander

perks.name: Exact Color Selection
perks.extended_description: Decide exactly which colors your commander options will have in their color identity.
perks.description: Pick exactly which colors in commander

perks.name: +1 Commander Choice
perks.extended_description: You will be shown 1 additional random commander option to choose from.

perks.name: +3 Commander Choices
perks.extended_description: You will be shown 3 additional random commander options to choose from.

perks.name: +5 Commander Choices
perks.extended_description: You will be shown 5 additional random commander options to choose from.

perks.name: +1 Pack of Any Budget
perks.extended_description: Get an extra pack to draft your deck from. This pack can include both cheap and expensive cards.
perks.description: Get an extra pack with any budget

perks.name: +1 Expensive Pack
perks.extended_description: Get an extra pack to draft your deck from. This pack will only include expensive cards. (Uses TCGPlayer Price USD)

perks.name: +1 Bracket 3 Pack
perks.extended_description: Get an extra pack to draft your deck from. This pack will include cards commonly put in bracket 3 decks for your chosen commander.

perks.name: +1 Bracket 4 Pack
perks.extended_description: Get an extra pack to draft your deck from. This pack will include cards commonly put in bracket 4 decks for your chosen commander.

perks.name: 1 Game Changer
perks.extended_description: Get a pack that will have a game changer in it that players commonly use with your chosen commander.
perks.description: Get a pack with 1 game changer

perks.name: Game Changers 3x
perks.extended_description: Get a pack that will have 3 game changers in it that players commonly use with your chosen commander.
perks.description: Get a pack with 3 game changers

perks.name: High Synergy Spotlight
perks.extended_description: Add a pack that pulls the single highest synergy card from EDHRec for your commander.

perks.name: High Synergy Duo
perks.extended_description: Add a pack that contains the top two highest synergy cards from EDHRec for your commander.

perks.name: High Synergy Showcase
perks.extended_description: Add a pack that contains the top three highest synergy cards from EDHRec for your commander.

perks.name: Conspiracy Card
perks.extended_description: Get 1 random conspiracy card, these cards go into the command zone and have unique effects on the game.

perks.name: Conspiracy Cards 3x
perks.extended_description: Get 3 random conspiracy cards, choose 1 to use, these cards go into the command zone and have unique effects on the game.
perks.description: Get 3 random conspiracy cards, choose 1 to use

perks.name: 1 Test Card
perks.extended_description: Get 1 random test card. These cards are 'scrapbook' looking cards made by WotC that sometimes have crazy effects.

perks.name: Test Cards 3x
perks.extended_description: Get 3 random test cards. These cards are 'scrapbook' looking cards made by WotC that sometimes have crazy effects.

perks.name: Silver-Border Cards x2
perks.extended_description: Get 2 random silver-border cards, these are fun, whimsical cards not legal in most formats.

perks.name: Silver-Border Cards x4
perks.extended_description: Get 4 random silver-border cards, these are fun, whimsical cards not legal in most formats.

perks.name: Banned Cards 3x
perks.extended_description: Get 3 random cards from the commander banlist that fit within your commander's color identity.

perks.name: ScangTech Cards x3
perks.extended_description: Get 3 random ScangTech cards. These are favorites, high value cards, ramp, copy effects, big spells, chaos, and more.

perks.name: ScangTech Cards x6
perks.extended_description: Get 6 random ScangTech cards. These are favorites, high value cards, ramp, copy effects, big spells, chaos, and more.

perks.name: JpTech Cards x3
perks.extended_description: Get 3 random JpTech cards. Jp's favorite cards, which are commonly comprised of token synergies, aristocrat themes, and versatile interaction pieces.

perks.name: JpTech Cards x6
perks.extended_description: Get 6 random JpTech cards. Jp's favorite cards, which are commonly comprised of token synergies, aristocrat themes, and versatile interaction pieces.

perks.name: +1 Pack of Lands of Any Cost
perks.extended_description: Get an additional pack that is comprised of 10 lands that can be of ANY price.
perks.description: Get an additional pack that is 10 any cost lands

perks.name: +1 Pack of Expensive Lands
perks.extended_description: Get an additional pack that is comprised of 10 lands that are on the higher end of the price spectrum. Often includes OG dual lands and fetches.
perks.description: Get an additional pack that is 10 expensive lands

perks.name: Become MDFC-Pilled
perks.extended_description: Get a pack of 10 MDFC lands. These are lands with spells on the other side, so you can feel less bad about running enough lands.
perks.description: Get a pack of 10 MDFC lands

perks.name: Signature Spell
perks.extended_description: You choose an instant or sorcery card from your deck to be your 'signature spell'. You can cast it from the command zone.
perks.description: Instant/sorcery in the command zone, can recast with separate commander tax (like oathbreaker)

perks.name: Partner Commander
perks.extended_description: Pick any creature from your deck, you may add it as a partner commander, must be within color identity of main commander. The chosen creature doesn't need to have 'partner.'
perks.description: Choose a creature from your deck to be a partner commander.

perks.name: Sharpie Commander
perks.extended_description: Sharpie some text off of your commander's textbox section. The text you remove must be a contiguous line going only between words.
perks.description: Sharpie text off of your commander to alter what it does.
